p.d: The soprano Natalie Dessay and the composer and arranger Yvan Cassar reinvent the legendary repertoire of Claude Nougaro, the undisputed master of words and music. "I set out here to explore Claude's feminine side, someone so eminently masculine in so many respects and at first sight..." Presented by: SÃ©bastien Folin; directed by: Philippe Sommet.
